'''2.14.12''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on November 29, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Improved Launcher UI.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed some bugs with the Realms tab in Java Edition or Bedrock Edition.
* {{Bug|MCL-23675}} - Quick Play labels used for the Quick Play feature are untranslatable.
